rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TI.IETESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name IETEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in IETESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). IETESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. The prefix "IE" is used to ensure consistency with the IE domain.
datasetVariables.label: Incl/Excl Criterion Short Name
datasetVariables.name: IETESTCD

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TI.IETEST

datasetVariables.description: Full text of the inclusion or exclusion criterion. The prefix "IE" is used to ensure consistency with the IE domain.
datasetVariables.label: Inclusion/Exclusion Criterion
datasetVariables.name: IETEST

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TI.IESCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of the exception criterion. Can be used to distinguish criteria for a sub-study or to categorize as major or minor exceptions. Examples: "MAJOR", "MINOR".
datasetVariables.label: Inclusion/Exclusion Subcategory
datasetVariables.name: IESCAT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TI.TIVERS

datasetVariables.description: The number of this version of the Inclusion/Exclusion criteria. May be omitted if there is only one version.
datasetVariables.label: Protocol Criteria Versions
datasetVariables.name: TIVERS

description: A trial design domain that contains one record for each of the inclusion and exclusion criteria for the trial. This domain is not subject oriented. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49620, 2018-06-29)
label: Trial Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria
name: TI
